member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AirportBoard.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Renders a colored block of whatever color you choose
member.param: Color of the row of blocks
Position of the sprite leftwise (Starts at 0, must include TOPPOS)
Position of the sprite topwise (Starts at 0, must include LEFTPOS)

member.name: M:AirportBoard.BasicRender.ClearLine(System.Int32,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Clears a line
member.param: Line that you're clearing (Line 0 is the top line)
In the event that the background isn't black, you can set it to be whatever color you want.

member.name: M:AirportBoard.BasicRender.Draw(System.String)
member.summary:
Draw allows you to use a string of characters to "Draw" on screen.
0 = Black 8 = Gray 1 = Blue 9 = Light Blue 2 = Green A = Light Green 3 = Aqua B = Light Aqua 4 = Red C = Light Red 5 = Purple D = Light Purple 6 = Yellow E = Light Yellow 7 = White F = Bright White

member.name: M:AirportBoard.BasicRender.Echo(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a message
member.param: The message you wish to display, dumb dumb
Wether or not to put a linebreak

Leftpos in reference to the window
Toppos in reference to the window
